desc: The Lip Lab Surry Hills. Create your own custom blended lipstick, lip gloss, concealer or foundation on the spot with one of our consultants in less than 30 minutes. We cater to group bookings, birthday parties, corporate events & hen's parties.

layout.text: Limited Edition Pantone Colour of the Year Lipstick!

Limited Edition 2022 Pantone Lipstick - only 100 created, and never to be recreated!
Each case is individually numbered.
